column1: Kata Robata////The place was extremely loud. And we ordered the spicy ramen
column3: and some sushi. The scallop sushi was great and the other sushi like salmon was average. And the regular duck ramen was ok. But the spicy ramen that I ordered had a sweet milky taste! I prefer my ramen to be on the salty side but not sweet and milky. My friend and I both agreed that this place was average. On the other side
column4: the waiter was extremely attentive and provided great service! If you are used to getting really great quality food
